Class DateTime

  • java.lang.Object
    • Date
      • DateTime

  • public class DateTime
extends Date
    Represents date and time using day, month, year, hour and minute.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private int hour  
      private int minute

    • Constructor Detail

      • DateTime

        public DateTime​(int year,
                int month,
                int day,
                int hour,
                int minute)
        Constructs DateTime. If given values are out of specified range, default values are set.
        Parameters:
        year - range: [-3999 - 3999], default: 0
        month - range: [1 - 12], default: 1
        day - range: [1 - 31], default: 1
        hour - range: [0 - 23], default: 0
        minute - range: [0 - 59], default: 0

    • Method Detail

      • equals

        public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object other)
        Checks if two DateTime objects are equal. DateTime objects are equal if they represent the same date and time.
        Overrides:
        equals in class Date
        Parameters:
        other - DateTime to compare to
        Returns:
        true if equal, false otherwise

      • hashCode

        public int hashCode​()
        Returns a unique hash code based on the values stored in DateTime.

        Hash is sum of minutes passed since 01/01/0000 00:00 to absolute date and time + 1.5 million to avoid conflicts with superclass.

        Hash code is negative for negative years.
        Overrides:
        hashCode in class Date
        Returns:
        unique hash code

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString​()
        Returns date and time in DD/MM/YYYY hh:mm format.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Date
        Returns:
        string representation of DateTime

      • setHour

        public void setHour​(int hour)
        Sets the hour value. If given value is out of range, defaults to 0.
        Parameters:
        hour - range: [0 - 23], default: 0

      • setMinute

        public void setMinute​(int minute)
        Sets the minute value. If given value is out of range, defaults to 0.
        Parameters:
        minute - range: [0 - 59], default: 0

      • getHour

        public int getHour​()
        Gets the hour value.
        Returns:
        hour

      • getMinute

        public int getMinute​()
        Gets the minute value.
        Returns:
        minute
